name: YouTube Big Player Window filled v2.2
description:
Use with 1920x1080 pixel resolution on Windows 10. Maximize Firefox and change to theather mode. Feel free to edit few values, to have the best result.

Notice:
A few unneeded elements are set to visibility:hidden. Use of opacity:0.4 for HUD.

The Title of the video will appear (fixed) between search- and upload-button. It will always be there, when you scroll down. The playlist is under the video player.
